title: Revenue and Non-Revenue Passenger-Miles, Domestic Airlines for United States
notes:
Data Are For Revenue And Non-Revenue Miles Flown. Source: Data For 1931-1939: U.S. Department Of Commerce, Air Commerce Bulletin. Data For 1940-1941: Civil Aeronautics Administration, Civil Aeronautics Journal.

This NBER data series m03071 appears on the NBER website in Chapter 3 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter03.html.

NBER Indicator: m03071
